channel.title: Need help getting server up
channel.description:
ive got so far in my coding only to fall short on the runserver part .... my compiler works but wen irun my runserver it says starting testcape server o 0.0.0.0:43594
and i need i on a diff p to get it up on no-ip.com can anybody pelase help me

item.title: Need help getting server up

item.description:
@Mike1515 wrote:

ive done all that it sed and it still isnt workin please help again

i did the port 80 redirect on no-ip

and then i went on that post forwarding and did as it sed and it isnt workin what should i do ???

Read full topic

item.title: Need help getting server up
item.dc:creator: @Belthazar Belthazar
item.description:
@Belthazar wrote:

When your runserver.bat says 0.0.0.0.0.:43594 Thats normal [br][size=1]Posted on: June 21, 2007, 08:17:37 PM[/size][hr]It is suppose to say that.
On no-ip you need to do a port 80 redirect. Your ip from your default gateway will be there and as well you need to type your port.
Which is 43594.
After you do this you must do a portforward.
If you go to www.portforward.com
It will tell you how to do this.
Next all you got to do is add your server to the status list.

Read full topic
